acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: The accd. persons are acquitted from the charges u/s 376(D) IPC R/W sec. 4 of POCSO Act. The accd. persons are convicted u/s 366(A)/34 IPC and sentenced to under go R.I. for 5 years and to pay fine of Rs.5,000/- i/d, RI for six months each.
